additional_conditions.text: PHOTOCOPIES OF SIGNED DOCUMENTS ACCEPTABLE WHERE SIGNED COPIES REQUIRED.

PRODUCT INSURANCE ON OPENER'S ACCOUNT. INSURANCE IS COVERED BY APPLICANT THROUGH NATIONAL INSURANCE COMPANY LIMITED, KARACHI PAKISTAN. ESTIMATED SHIPMENT DETAILS TO BE ADVISED TO N.I.C.L 5 DAYS BEFORE AND ACTUAL SHIPMENT DETAILS 5 DAYS AFTER THE ACTUAL DATE OF SHIPMENT AT NICAL'S FAX NOS. 0092 2199225864 / 99225075 AND/OR EMAIL TO MUHAMMADUSMAN@NICL.COM.PK, MUHAMMAD.AWAI5@NICL.COM.PK REFERRING TO THEIR NOMINEE OPEN POLICY NO. NICL/M/SZ/OP/PSO/3452/
INSURANCE ADVICE TO THIS EFFECT FROM BENEFICIARY MUST ACCOMPANY ORIGINAL DOCUMENTS.

ONE COMPLETE SET OF COPIES DOCUMENTS SHOULD BE FAXED OR EMAIL DIRECTLY TO THE OPENER (FAX NO.0092 21 99203728 OR TRADEFINANCE(AT)PSOPK.COM). (FAX TRANSMISSION SLIP OR COPY OF EMAIL TO THIS EFFECT SHOULD ACCOMPANY THE DOCUMENTS).
GOODS ARE IMPORTABLE UNDER THE FOLLOWING H.S.CODE AND IMPORTER'S N.T.N NUMBER WHICH SHOULD APPEAR ON INVOICES. + H.S.CODE NUMBER(S) 2710.1210 + IMPORTER'S N.T.N NUMBER 0711554-7
DOCUMENTS PRESENTED WITHIN 30 DAYS FROM THE VESSEL NOTICE OF READINESS AT DISCHARGE PORT DATE AND WITHIN THE VALIDITY OF L/C ARE ACCEPTABLE. ALL DOCUMENTS MUST BE PROPERLY STAMPED.

IF THE DUE DATE OF PAYMENT FALLS ON A NON-BANKING DAY IN PAKISTAN AND/OR IN THE COUNTRY OF CURRENCY OF LETTER OF CREDIT, PAYMENT SHALL BE MADE ON A BANKING DAY IMMEDIATELY FOLLOWING THE DUE DATE OF PAYMENT.

IN CASE OF TEMPORARILY MISSING DOCUMENTS AT THE TIME WHEN PAYMENT IS DUE, PAYMENT SHALL BE EFFECTED AGAINST (I) SIGNED COMMERCIAL INVOICE IN ONE ORIGINAL PLUS TWO COPIES. (II) BANK GUARANTEE IN FAVOR OF APPLICANT, THROUGH ANY BANK IN PAKISTAN AND IS A SCHEDULED BANK, AS DEFINED IN STATE BANK OF PAKISTAN ACT

(III) ISSUANCE OF ACCEPTANCE LETTER OF BANK GUARANTEE BY THE APPLICANT IN FAVOR OF THE BENEFICIARY. (IV) 03 ORIGINAL PLUS 03 NON-NEGOTIABLE COPIES OF CLEAN ON BOARD BILL OF LADING AS MENTIONED IN CLAUSE 46A
OF THE LIST OF CLEAN LC DOCUMENTS MENTIONED ABOVE.
PRODUCT INSURANCE ON OPENER'S ACCOUNT AND VESSEL OVERAGE INSURANCE TO BE ON SELLER'S ACCOUNT.
DRAFT BILLS OF EXCHANGE NOT REQUIRED.
ALL BANK CHARGES OUTSIDE PAKISTAN INCLUDING L/C CONFIRMATION CHARGES TO BE PAYABLE BY BENEFICIARY, CONFIRMATION MAY BE ADDED IF REQUIRED BY THE BENEFICIARY.
CHARTER PARTY AND/OR TANKER BILL OF LADING ACCEPTABLE.
SPELLING AND/OR TYPOGRAPHICAL ERRORS IN L/C AND OR IN DOCUMENTS EXCEPT IN FIGURE AND AMOUNT ARE NOT TO BE TREATED AS DISCREPANCY.
THIRD PARTY DOCUMENTS EXCEPT INVOICE ARE ACCEPTABLE.
NAME OF THE DOCUMENTS EXCEPT BILL OF LADING AND INVOICE DIFFERENT FROM L/C BUT SERVE THE SAME PURPOSE ARE ACCEPTABLE.
ALL INVOICE(S) MUST INDICATE SHORE TO SHIP OR SHIP-TO-SHIP LOADING AND HS CODE NO. 2710.1210
HOUSE/FORWARDER BILL OF LADING/NON-NEGOTIABLE SEA WAY BILL NOT ACCEPTABLE.
TENOR OF L/C TO READ AS "AT 30 CALENDAR DAYS FROM NOR AT DISCHARGE PORT (NOR DATE TO COUNT AS DAY 1)".
IN CASE THE VESSEL SINKS, DOCUMENT NO.1 OF FIELD 46A (NOR) AND DOCUMENT NO.10 OF FIELD 46A (CERTIFICATE OF RECEIPTED QUANTITY) ARE NOT REQUIRED FOR PAYMENT NEGOTIATION.
IF BENEFICIARY PRESENTS DOCUMENTS NO.1 OF FIELD 46A (NOR) THEN DOCUMENT NO.9 OF FIELD 46A (AUTHENTIC REPORT OF SHIPPING INTELLIGENCE) IS NOT REQUIRED FOR PAYMENT NEGOTIATION.
IF THE VESSEL SUNK, PAYMENT SHALL BE MADE TO THE BENEFICIARY AFTER 60 DAYS FROM THE DATE OF B/L (B/L DATE TO COUNT AS DAY ONE) ON THE BASIS OF B/L QUANTITY.
SHIPMENT ON ISRAELI, FLAGGED VESSELS NOT ALLOWED AND A CERTIFICATE TO THIS EFFECT FROM BENEFICIARY MUST ACCOMPANY ORIGINAL DOCUMENTS.

WE DISCLAIM LIABILITY FOR DELAY, NON-RETURN OF DOCUMENTS, NON-PAYMENT, OR OTHER ACTION OR INACTION COMPELLED BY RESTRICTIVE MEASURES, COUNTER-MEASURES, SANCTIONS LAWS, REGULATIONS OR EXECUTIVE OR JUDICIAL ORDERS MANDATORILY APPLICABLE TO US OR TO OUR CORRESPONDENT IN THE RELEVANT TRANSACTION.
DIFFERENCES IN QUANTITY SHOWN ON SHIPPING DOCUMENTS ARE ACCEPTABLE
THE MEASUREMENT OF QUANTITY RECEIVED ON VESSELS EXPERIENCE FACTOR CERTIFICATE SHOWING LAST CALL PORT INCONSISTENT WITH PORT CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE ACCEPTABLE.

GOODS DESCRIBED ON SHIPPING AND OTHER DOCUMENTS NEED NOT BE IDENTICAL TO THE DESCRIPTION OF GOODS IN THIS LC. HOWEVER, MOGAS 92 RON SHOULD NECESSARILY BE MENTIONED ON THE DOCUMENTS EXCEPT ON PORT CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE.

ALL DOCUMENTS TO BE ISSUED IN ENGLISH LANGUAGE. .++++FIELD 44F+++++ PORT KEAMARI, KARACHI PAKISTAN/PORT QASIM (FOTCO) KARACHI PAKISTAN .++++CONT'D FROM FIELD 78++++ (+) UPON RECEIPT (DURING THE WORKING HOURS IN PAKISTAN) BY THE OPENER OF THE TESTED AUTHENTICATED SWIFT OF THE NEGOTIATING BANK CONFIRMING THAT THE NEGOTIATING BANK HAS NEGOTIATED DOCUMENTS ISSUED IN STRICT CONFORMITY WITH THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THIS CREDIT AND HAS DISPATCHED THE DOCUMENTS BY REGISTERED MAIL/ COURIER TO OUR ADDRESS SHOWING THE REGISTERED MAIL NO./ COURIER RECEIPT NO. AND DATE OF DISPATCH OF DOCUMENTS, THE NEGOTIATING BANK WILL REIMBURSE VIA REIMBURSING BANK AT MATURITY DATE ACCORDING TO ITS INSTRUCTIONS. HOWEVER, PAYMENT WILL BE EXECUTED AFTER 3 WORKING DAYS AFTER RECEIPT OF COMPLYING DOCUMENTS OR SWIFT MESSAGE CONFIRMING PRESENTATION OF COMPLYING DOCUMENTS 71D: Charges REFER CLAUSE NO. 10 OF FIELD 47A
Additional Conditions \(/ A D D /+)\)
: DELETE '30 DAYS' REPLACE BY '45 DAYS'
Additional Conditions
/ADD/+)

"SHIPMENT TO BE EFFECTED ONLY ON PANAMA FLAGGED VESSEL AND A CERTIFICATE TO THIS EFFECT FROM \title{ HBI } 6th Floor, Jubilee Insurance House BENEFICIARY MUST ACCOMPANY QRSIUMMENTS. Karachi - Pakistan Tel: 0092-021-32464885 swift: HABB PK KA 786
Additional Conditions

/ADD/+)CLAUE NO.27 TO READ AS "LETTER OF AUTHORITY FOR SIGNING BILL OF LADING IS ACCEPTABLE TO COMPLY L/C CLAUSE FIELD 46A-3. NO FURTHER DOCUMENTARY EVIDENCE WILL BE REQUIRED AGAINST "LETTER OF AUTHORITY FOR SIGNING BILL OF LADING" UNDER L/C CLAUSE FIELD 46A-3"
Additional Conditions \(/ A D D /+)\)

: DELETE ' 5 DAYS BEFORE AND ACTUAL SHIPMENT DETAILS 5 DAYS AFTER THE ACTUAL DATE OF SHIPMENT' ' REPLACE BY 'AT LEAST 3 DAYS BEFORE AND ACTUAL SHIPMENT DETAILS AT MOST 3 DAYS AFTER THE ACTUAL DATE OF SHIPMENT' '

documents_required.text: 3/3 ORIGINAL PLUS 3 NON-NEGOTIABLE COPIES OF CLEAN ON BOARD BILL OF LADING ISSUED OR ENDORSED TO THE ORDER OF HBL KARACHI, PAKISTAN AND NOTIFY PAKISTAN STATE OIL COMPANY LIMITED, KARACHI, PAKISTAN. BILL OF LADING TO BE DULY SIGNED BY THE MASTER UNDER HIS OFFICIAL SEAL OR MASTER'S AGENT FOR AND ON BEHALF OF THE MASTER UNDER HIS OFFICIAL SEAL. WHEN SIGNED BY AGENT OF THE MASTER, ONE COPY OR EMAIL OF MASTER'S AUTHORITY TO BE SUBMITTED FOR THE QUANTITY APPEARING ON BILL OF LADING. THE BILL OF LADING TO INDICATE, 'FREIGHT PREPAID' OR 'FREIGHT PAYABLE AS PER CHARTER PARTY AGREEMENT' AND TO BE DELIVERED TO THE PORT OF KEAMARI, KARACHI, PAKISTAN / PORT QASIM, (FOTCO) KARACHI, PAKISTAN.

3 SIGNED COPIES OF LOAD PORT INDEPENDENT INSPECTOR M/S CCIC SURVEYOR REPORT COMPRISING TANKER CLEANLINESS, PRODUCTS QUALITY AND QUANTITY CERTIFICATES, SHORE TANK MEASUREMENTS BEFORE AND AFTER LOADING AND THE MEASUREMENTS OF QUANTITY RECEIVED ON VESSEL'S EXPERIENCE FACTOR SHOWING AT LEAST LAST FIVE PORTS OF CALL OR LOAD PORT WITH DATES AND CARGOES CARRIED ISSUED BY LOAD PORT SURVEYOR M/S CCIC.

ONE ORIGINAL PLUS 3 SIGNED COPIES OF CERTIFICATE OF ORIGIN ISSUED OR COUNTERSIGNED BY CHAMBER OF COMMERCE OR RELEVANT PORT AUTHORITIES OR RELEVANT TERMINAL OPERATOR (ISSUED IN THE NAME OF APPLICANT AS CONSIGNEE ACCEPTABLE) MENTIONING GOODS OF CHINA ORIGIN.
3 SIGNED COPIES OF TIME SHEET ISSUED BY M/S CCIC.
COPY OF MASTER'S RECEIPT FOR SEALED SAMPLES AT LOAD PORT (DULY SIGNED BY THE MASTER UNDER HIS OFFICIAL SEAL).
THREE SIGNED COPIES OF 'PORT CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE' ISSUED BY LAST PORT CALL. IN CASE OF ELECTRONICALLY GENERATED CERTIFICATE NO SIGNATURE IS REQUIRED.

IN CASE THE VESSEL SINKS, THREE SIGNED COPIES OF AUTHENTIC REPORT OF SHIPPING INTELLIGENCE, A.I. LOYDS OR REPORT FROM INSURER OF HULL AND MACHINERY OF VESSEL REGARDING SINKING OF VESSEL IN CASE VESSEL SINKS.
THREE SIGNED COPIES OF "CERTIFICATE OF RECEIPTED QUANTITY"
"M/S.SAWANT AND CO.PRIVATE LTD" INSTEAD OF "M/S TO BE NOMINATED"
